pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# Manual SetupSDK requires poetry. You can find install instructuction [here](https://python-poetry.org/)Clone the repo to local folder```git clone https://github.com/PuremlHQ/PureML```Navigate to packages > sdk```poetry installpoetry report any bugs you have faced while using PureML package, please1. Report it in [Discord](https://discord.gg/xNUHt9yguJ) channel2. Open an [issue](https://github.com/PureMLHQ/PureML/issues)
## Contributing and DevelopingLets work together to improve the features for everyone. Here's step one for you to go through our [Contributing Guide](./CONTRIBUTING.md). We are already waiting for amazing ideas and features which you all have got.Work with mutual respect. Please take a look at our public [Roadmap here](https://pureml.notion.site/7de13568835a4cf18913307503a2cdd4?v=82199f96833a48e5907023c8a8d565c6).
## CommunityTo get quick updates of feature releases of PureML, follow us on:[](https://twitter.com/getPureML) [](https://www.linkedin.com/company/PuremlHQ/) [](https://github.com/PureMLHQ/PureML) [](https://discord.gg/DBvedzGu)
